blue.lapis.common.economy.formatter

Interface BalanceFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBalanceFormatter, PrefixBalanceFormatter, SuffixBalanceFormatter

    public interface BalanceFormatter
    Produces formatted currency Strings for display

    • Method Detail

      • format

        Converts a machine-readable currency into a human-readable String which expresses its quantity and units
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of currency to render
        Returns:
        A formatted String expressing the currency's quantity and units.
